column1: Little Goat Diner////Super yummy and quick fast food spot! It's extremely easy to order through their outside window and there's plenty of spots around for high tables
column3: and cute lawn chairs. They also have big connect 4 and cute greenery in their outdoor space located on the street. I ordered sourdough pancakes with the peachy Daly & mimosa. It was all delicious and super fast service! The employees were extremely friendly. Would love to come back!
